text: 3.8 Jer 9.23-24, 1 Ko 2.2, Kol 2.2 Pen tap gelɨgɨpin anɨb okok nep mel, tap anɨb okok mɨdupsek nɨgen, tap yokɨp yɨbɨl mɨdeb. Klays Jisas Bɨawl yad mɨdeb ak, yad nop nɨgtep gɨpin. Gos anɨb ak nep tap nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl mɨdeb. Anɨb ak tek tap yokɨp anɨb okok, mɨdupsek tap dayday tek lek agɨl pɨsnep kelɨgɨl, Klays nop nokom kɨdek gɨl chɨgɨnɨm.
